articles.title: US tech stocks slide after Altman warns on AI future and MIT study casts doubt on the hype
articles.summary: Investors’ long-running enthusiasm for artificial intelligence showed signs of faltering on Tuesday as tech stocks tumbled.
articles.translated_title: US tech stocks slide after Altman warns on AI future and MIT study casts doubt on the hype
articles.translated_summary: Investors’ long-running enthusiasm for artificial intelligence showed signs of faltering on Tuesday as tech stocks tumbled.

articles.title: Is the A.I. Sell-off the Start of Something Bigger?
articles.summary: A sharp drop in technology stocks, and even comments by OpenAI’s Sam Altman, suggest investors are getting too exuberant about artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: Is the A.I. Sell-off the Start of Something Bigger?

articles.title: Summer US IPO Thrills Set Stage for Crypto and AI-Led September
articles.summary: Companies touting their artificial intelligence and crypto-sector ties are speeding up their IPO timelines, after triple-digit first-day pops became a regular feature in this summer’s sizzling US market for new issues.

articles.title: Asian shares retreat, tracking tech losses on Wall Street
articles.summary: Asian shares have retreated, tracking a decline on Wall Street led by technology shares including Nvidia and other stars that have been riding the mania surrounding artificial-intelligence.

articles.title: Asian Shares Retreat, Tracking Tech Losses on Wall Street
articles.summary: TOKYO (AP) — Asian shares retreated on Wednesday, tracking a decline on Wall Street led by technology shares including Nvidia and other stars that have been riding the mania surrounding artificial-intelligence.
